markdown: ###### Moderate positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Fleshmender](/fleshmender/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Bounty - Onadere the Siren | next = Bounty - Urnox the Rathun | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Battlemage | guid = d3062c66-c3c5-4e87-93a0-a9bd7b81029d }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Ikorno](/ikorno/), an aumaua wizard, makes sport of killing elite Huana warriors. Those who suspect him of being a Rauataian agent have put a bounty on his head. ## Walkthrough * Ikauro is located in the [Kua o Rikuhu Islands](/kuaORikuhuIslands/), at the coordinates 12째 31' S 57째 45' E. He is assisted by a slew of mercenaries. Return to Okauro after he's dispatched. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Battlemage.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Ikorno''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Ikorno, an aumaua wizard, makes sport of killing elite Huana warriors. Those who suspect him of being a Rauataian agent have put a bounty on his head. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Ikorno.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Ikorno was last seen on the central isles of the Kua o Rikuhu chain. When I find him I can kill him for the bounty. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Okauro.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | I dealt with Ikorno. Okauro in the Sacred Stair district of Neketaka will want evidence of the kill in exchange for the reward. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I defeated Ikorno and claimed the bounty reward from Okauro. |}
